dublin_core.dcvalue: A four phased Delphi study has been performed on the topic of research needs and priorities to implement the Information Society within Healthcare This contribution presents the outcome of the first three phases The biggest surprises are that Telemedicine is relatively lower ranked than expected and that Business Process Re engineering is the highest ranking topic as judged from the number of issues and barriers raised by the expert panel
Studies in health technology and informatics
Research needs and priorities in health informatics--early results of a Delphi study.
